description: This CSS file contains variables and styles for theming a React application, including light and dark themes, and styles for various components such as headers, links, and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container that centers content and applies background color based on the current theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application's header section, providing layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, using theme colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button to toggle between themes, including positioning and hover effects.
